As some people have requested, there is now a feature on the site to add characters to the deceased list. However, you still need to delete your char bios when you kill your chars, so you will need to both "Kill" (delete the bio) and "Bury" (add to the deceased list) your chars. To see what I'm talking about, login and check it out.
